assistance.title: Assistance
assistance.lead:
In racing, being ready is everything. With our assistance service we support you from preparation to the race weekend on track, taking care of set-up, checks and operations.
Essential equipment is prepared by the team: you travel light and focus on driving and performance, with no stress and no unnecessary load.
points: Complete trackside support throughout the race weekend
Equipment and essentials prepared by the team
Travel with peace of mind: you arrive and everything is ready
assistance.noteText: We reduce the organizational load and increase the quality of your track time: more focus, more continuity, more results.
assistance.highlightText: We prepare what’s needed and assist you at every step: from arrival and checks to on-track management. The goal is simple: to have you racing in the best possible conditions.
assistance.miniLeftText: Helmet, clothing and whatever you need to feel comfortable on track.
assistance.miniRightText: Technical support, organization and essential equipment prepared by the team.

kartingSchool.title: Karting School
kartingSchool.lead:
A dedicated path for kids and teens, designed to enter karting the right way: gradual onboarding, driving technique, good habits and steady progression.
From karting school to the first races, we support drivers and families with a clear method, realistic goals and track presence.
points: Start young and progress by age and category
Training, technique and a “race after race” mindset
kartingSchool.tipText: Every driver has different timing: we build a tailored path, keeping consistency and peace of mind for both driver and family.
